scripts.dev: start cmd /k "cd /d d:\Virtual-Tutor\virtual_teacher_project && python -m daphne -b 0.0.0.0 -p 8000 virtual_teacher_project.asgi:application" && timeout /t 3 /nobreak > nul && cd UI\Dashboard\Dashboard && npm install && npm start
scripts.frontend: cd UI\Dashboard\Dashboard && npm install && npm start
scripts.setup: pip install -r requirements.txt && cd UI\Dashboard\Dashboard && npm install
